What are VerusID Profiles and how do they utilize the Verus Data Exchange Format (VDXF)?

VerusID Profiles are a decentralized way to showcase one's online identity, utilizing the Verus Data Exchange Format (VDXF). With a VerusID Profile, you have complete control over the content and can never be deplatformed. Currently, these profiles can contain various types of data, such as images, videos, posts, and proofs of ownership of social media accounts, websites, or crypto addresses.

The data storage for VerusID Profiles is decentralized, using providers like Arweave, which ensures that the data is secure and not controlled by a single entity. This is just the beginning of what is possible with VerusID and VDXF, and future developments will expand the capabilities of these profiles.

One of the key benefits of VerusID Profiles is that they allow individuals to maintain ownership and control over their online identity, without relying on centralized platforms. This decentralized approach enables users to showcase their online presence in a secure and transparent manner.

VerusID Profiles are a prime example of the potential of the Verus ecosystem, which is focused on providing decentralized solutions for identity management and data exchange.

To showcase VerusID and Verus Data Exchange Format (VDXF) capabilities you can now create your very own profile with VerusID. As of right now these profiles can contain images, videos, posts and proofs of ownership of social media accounts, websites or crypto addresses. You are in total control of your profile and you can never be deplatformed. For data storage Arweave is used, a decentralized storage provider. Other storage providers can also be used. This is only the beginning and we haven’t even scratched the surface of what is possible with VerusID and VDXF. Stay tuned for instructions to create your VerusID Profile.

A new Verus Mobile update has entered initial testing. Among the new updates is the Wyre integration which lets you convert to/from fiat to BTC/ETH. If you have a US residence address, it also lets you connect a bank account.
